``grgrlib.optimize``
--------------------
Hand-written optimizers. Currently only CMA-ES. Look for the documentation of `cmaes` (the UI) to understand its usage.

.. automodule:: grgrlib.optimize
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
